Jobs.title: Triathlon Coach
Jobs.description: ', '    I am a level 2 coach, currently doing the level 3.  Due to finish November 2012.', '', 'Club coach for Northants Triathlon club. Coaching the adult club and also lead coach for the junior triathlon section.', '', 'Swim coach for Wootton Road Runners club.', '', 'I also have experience of coaching open water.', '

Jobs.title: owner
Jobs.description: ', '    Looking at the latest technologies and creative ideas to develop applications, interactive games and content for various hardware such as hand held devices (i.e. mobile / ipad)', '', 'Created a number of concepts for Augmented Reality applications (business as well as gaming) across various platforms.', '

summary: ', '    A Producer/Project Manager of applications and games, I have a proven track record creating engaging entertainment for children and adults working with a wide variety of Intellectual Properties.', 'Successfully grew a department creating games for Sky Games, which in turn was eventually sold as a studio to Disney, where I oversaw multiple launches of both UK and international games products.', 'My expertise ranges across multiple technologies and well over 30 high-profile brands.', '
